abstract: In describing his impending move to Asia, JPMorgan Chase’s global head of investment banking says that his top mandate remains making the firm a top player across all regions of the globe.
snippet: In describing his impending move to Asia, JPMorgan Chase’s global head of investment banking says that his top mandate remains making the firm a top player across all regions of the globe.
lead_paragraph: Over his four years at JPMorgan Chase, Jeff Urwin has taken an increasingly global role. Now, the next stop in his career involves moving halfway around the world.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s New Asia Chief Sees Growth Opportunities

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
